author: ggovi
body:
#### PR description:

Payload Inspector Interface generalised to support combinations of iov-policies and tag multiplicity 

#### PR validation:

- All the System-specific unit tests executed; picture plot files compared with previous release after generation
- BasicPayload plots generated in stand-alone running the getPayloadData script
- Current branch deployed as the DEMO release  in the Payload Inspector application
title: Improvements for Payload inspector
